DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial compare overall lens fit acceptance two different soft contact lenses Asian population .
DOC.brief_title: A Non-dispensing Fit Evaluation Investigational Limbal Ring Soft Contact Lenses With Polyvinylpyrrolidone ( PVP ) Asian Eyes
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must read , understand , sign statement inform consent receive fully execute copy form . 2 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . The subject must Asian female ( selfreported ) . 4 . The subject must least 18 year old less 41 year old . 5 . The subject must meet two four East Asian anatomical category ( Appendix D ) prominent epicanthic fold classify East Asian ethnicity . For purpose protocol , East Asian ethnicity may include : China , Japan , Korea , Taiwan , Vietnam , Hong Kong , Malaysia , Singapore inclusive region . 6 . The subject must habitual soft contact lens wearer . Habitual define : least one month daily wear lens wear minimum six ( 6 ) hour per day minimum three ( 3 ) day per week prior enrollment study . 7 . The subject 's optimal nonvertexed spherical equivalent distance correction ( base optimal spherocylinder refraction ) must +2.00 D 12.00 D. 8 . Any cylinder power must less equal 1.00 D confirm refraction . 9 . The subject must possess functional/usable pair spectacle wear visit ( applicableto investigator 's discretion ) . 10 . The subject 's best correctable visual acuity 20/40 better ( OD OS ) baseline visit . 1 . Ocular systemic allergy might interfere contact lens wear . 2 . Ocular systemic disease might interfere contact lens wear . 3 . Any known hypersensitivity allergic reaction contact lenses contact lens solution . 4 . Use ocular topical medication . 5 . Use systemic ( oral ) medication take ocular condition might interfere contact lens wear . 6 . Use systemic ( oral ) medication take systemic condition might interfere contact lens wear ( determination discretion investigator ) . 7 . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , bulbar injection abnormality cornea and/or conjunctiva would contraindicate contact lens wear . 8 . Rigid gas permeable hybrid design ( rigid gas permeable center soft lens skirt ) contact lens wear within past 30 day . 9 . Entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia . 10 . Any previous plan ( duration study ) , ocular intraocular surgery ( e.g . radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , peripheral iridotomy , etc . ) 11 . Pregnancy lactation . 12 . Diabetes . 13 . Infectious disease . 14 . Habitual contact lens type multifocal , monovision worn extend wear . 15 . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 7 day prior study enrollment . 16 . Suspicion recent history od alcohol substance abuse . 17 . History serious mental illness . 18 . History seizure . 19 . Employee family member investigational clinic ( e.g . Investigator , Coordinator , Technician ) .
